name: Computer Science
description: Focuses on computing, software development, and artificial intelligence.

name: Information Technology
description: Emphasizes IT systems, networks, and tech support.

name: Data Science
description: Deals with data analysis, machine learning, and statistics.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Focuses on protecting systems and networks from digital attacks.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: Covers electronics, circuits, and power systems.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Deals with design and manufacturing of machines.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Focuses on infrastructure like roads, bridges, and buildings.

name: Chemical Engineering
description: Applies chemistry to industrial processes and materials.

name: Mechatronics
description: Integrates mechanical, electrical, and software systems.

name: Agriculture
description: Covers farming, food production, and agribusiness.

name: Animal Science
description: Studies livestock, veterinary care, and animal production.

name: Food Science
description: Focuses on food safety, nutrition, and processing.

name: Environmental Science
description: Focuses on sustainability and ecosystems.

name: Geology
description: Studies the earth’s structure, minerals, and natural resources.

name: Architecture
description: Combines art and engineering to design buildings.

name: Urban Planning
description: Designs city infrastructure and public spaces.

name: Business Administration
description: Covers management, finance, and entrepreneurship.

name: Accounting
description: Focuses on financial reporting, auditing, and tax.

name: Economics
description: Studies markets, policies, and financial systems.

name: Human Resource Management
description: Handles recruitment, employee welfare, and labor relations.

name: Law
description: Covers legal systems, rights, and judicial practice.

name: Criminology
description: Studies crime, criminal behavior, and law enforcement.

name: Medicine
description: Trains future doctors and healthcare professionals.

name: Pharmacy
description: Deals with drug development, prescription, and safety.

name: Nursing
description: Focuses on patient care and clinical support.

name: Public Health
description: Promotes community health and disease prevention.

name: Psychology
description: Studies human behavior and mental processes.

name: Sociology
description: Analyzes human society, relationships, and culture.

name: Education
description: Prepares students to become teachers and educators.

name: Special Needs Education
description: Trains educators to support learners with disabilities.

name: Languages & Linguistics
description: Studies languages, their structure, and communication.

name: Fine Arts
description: Covers visual arts, design, and creative expression.

name: Performing Arts
description: Focuses on music, dance, and drama.

name: Library and Information Science
description: Manages information systems and digital archives.
